SUPNAME = #{supname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPLOGINNAME = #{suploginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISOPENFSINFO = #{isopenfsinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROMOCODE = #{promocode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPROMOCODE = #{suppromocode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PROMONUM = #{promonum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROMOFEE = #{promofee,jdbcType=FLOAT},

ISMODIFY = #{ismodify,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VALIDNUM = #{validnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERSPECIALFLAG = #{userspecialflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
